text: Not sure whether this is the right channel to post this question, but I was wondering: do we have something like Halide (<https://halide-lang.org/>) in julia? It basically allows one to write stencil operations in a backend independent way. Looks very useful when one wants something that is a bit more low-level than the premade convolution kernels, but more high level than writing CUDA kernels.
